p: There are several ongoing clinical trials using repurposed clinical-stage or approved drugs such as remdesivir, favipiravir, lopinavir/ritonavir, hydroxychloroquine, and natural or semisynthetic products like quercetin [ 71, 72], colchicine [ 73], tetrandrine [ 74], desferrioxamine B [ 75], azithromycin [ [76], [77], [78]] ( Fig. 10 ) are under investigation for treating COVID-19 patients, as well as several vaccines are in fast phases of clinical trials. Selected examples of natural products which are in current clinical trials to treat COVID-19 are shown below.
